summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of a portion of the south one-half of the southwest one-quarter of the southwest one-quarter of Section 20, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., located on the west side of 10th Avenue North between East Garfield Street and East Blaine Street, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-150 and 17-109, respectively.
